thread.title: Man killed in Cape Town blaze
thread.title_full: Man killed in Cape Town blaze | News24

author: news24.com
title: Man killed in Cape Town blaze
text:
Cape Town - A man was killed in a shack fire in Cafda, Retreat, in the early hours of Monday morning, City of Cape Town Fire Services confirmed.
“One adult male was killed in the fire and another person uninjured,” said spokesperson Theo Layne.
Two structures in Hertslet Road were damaged in the blaze.
“The cause of the fire remains undetermined,” Layne added.
